name: Datsue-ba
domainRole: Hag of the Sanzu River, Strips Clothes
shortLoreBlurb: Datsue-ba is a spirit from Japan linked to hag of the sanzu river, strips clothes. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains.
description: Datsue-ba is a spirit from Japan linked to hag of the sanzu river, strips clothes. Offerings seek calm waters and life-giving rains.
